Activity: Log in, check emails. Hopefully, there will be replies from @clinlead-1 and @pchmp-1 regarding the metrics review.
Review and analyze the feedback received from @clinlead-1 and @pchmp-1 regarding the data quality metrics.
Revise the data quality metrics based on the feedback received from the clinical team. Address any concerns or suggestions they may have raised.
Update the documentation to reflect the changes made to the data quality metrics. Ensure the documentation is clear, concise, and accurate.

Send an email to @da-1 and @da-2 outlining the finalized data quality metrics and weekly targets. Include a summary of the feedback received from the clinical team and the changes made to the metrics. Subject: 'Finalized Data Quality Metrics and Weekly Targets'
Lunch Break. Watch some videos about data quality on Youtube.

Start developing a test plan for validating the data quality metrics. The test plan should include a detailed description of the test cases, the expected results, and the steps required to execute the tests.
Email @qatest-2 to discuss the test plan and solicit their feedback. Subject: 'Review of Data Quality Metrics Test Plan'
Meeting with @qatest-2 to review the test plan. Incorporate their suggestions into the test plan.
Finalize the test plan and share it with the relevant stakeholders.
